document_title: Hydatid disease: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content: Complications can still occur when infected with rice tapeworm. For example, children or people with mental illness may have seizures, mood changes, and cardiovascular disorders.; Flukes attacking the eyes can cause increased intraocular pressure, decreased vision, and blindness.
subsection_title: san lon gao.json. Complications of rice fluke
subsection_data:
san lon gao.json. Complications of rice fluke
Complications can still occur when infected with rice tapeworm. For example, children or people with mental illness may have seizures, mood changes, and cardiovascular disorders.; Flukes attacking the eyes can cause increased intraocular pressure, decreased vision, and blindness.
